item.description:
Our Maltese Meet this month will take place the SECOND SUNDAY of the month, September 11. We moved it back a week due to Labor Day weekend being the first weekend in September.

We will meet again from 1pm to 4pm at Especially for Pets in Sudbury. They do have air conditioning! And it is a safe and friendly place.

Email me at laptopmaltese@aol.com,
and tell me what kinds of refreshments/food you'd like to see at the next Maltese Meet.

In addition, we are starting the Boston Beacon Hill/Back Bay Maltese Meet, which will take place on August 21st. Free parking behind the site, which is 'sPoochies. at 400 Tremont St. Also, meters are not enforced on Sundays.

I'll get back to you with directions. Please tell all your friends that live in Boston and have Maltese!



Thanks!

Maltese best,
Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Maltese September Meetup
